mapper.select: SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,vote,tag1,tag2,tag3,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,vote,tag1,tag2,tag3,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,vote,tag1,tag2,tag3 FROM pcreplyBoard ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,rownum as num FROM replyBoard ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replyBoard(no,name,subject,content,pwd) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM replyBoard), #{name},#{subject},#{content},#{pwd})
mapper.select: SELECT pwd FROM replyBoard WHERE no=#{no}
